data.text:
"Governments need to act & to act now. There is no time to lose."

-- @antonioguterres stresses the importance of urgent #ClimateAction while answering your questions, live on @Facebook: https://t.co/NgMQNimsOH https://t.co/v8AQgmgjjm

During this season of giving, why not share a meal on behalf of your family & friends and make a difference in someone's life with @ShareTheMealorg. https://t.co/c3SjIogONG #ZeroHunger https://t.co/iEHwGqsX0i

People living in low- and middle-income countries are increasingly suffering from both under-nutrition and obesity.

Healthy diets reduce the risk of malnutrition in all its forms by promoting growth, development & immunity. https://t.co/jfrecKlFus via @WHO https://t.co/1u4tkVmQPR

In a makeshift outdoor school in Afghanistan, 12-year-old Mursal is one of the few girls who managed to stay in school. 

See how @Refugees is working to help more girls finish their education. https://t.co/klynvqQGCb

https://t.co/xzjz8HiUXi

Simple steps can make a big difference when it comes to #ClimateAction.

Buy local produce and help protect our planet & all its people. https://t.co/CDodr7661k #ActNow https://t.co/ONC3Y4WJzz

Worldwide, an estimated 237 million children under five years old do not have a birth certificate.

More on the progress that's been made & what's left to do to ensure every child's birth is registered by 2030. #ForEveryChild https://t.co/fb2BfsTj7x

Happening this week: Global #RefugeeForum, International Migrants Day & much more.

Full list is here: https://t.co/aOqF6cv967 https://t.co/GUKXSPtqIz

"We count on youth. The voice of youth is essential for us."

-- @antonioguterres stressed role of young people in leading #ClimateAction movement when he took questions live on @Facebook. Watch: https://t.co/NgMQNi4Rq7 #COP25 https://t.co/ALd1s7Dsoy

Every 40 seconds, someone dies by suicide.

Find out what you can do if you think someone is considering suicide. https://t.co/ZcHB6gI9lq https://t.co/ayJstkyenQ

Indigenous languages are important for development, peace building, reconciliation & more.

2019 is the International Year of Indigenous Languages. https://t.co/UsuA4IGL0i #WeAreIndigenous https://t.co/I6AuJ5t57t

"We must not give up, and I will not give up."

-- @antonioguterres expresses disappointment that the international community did not use #COP25 as an opportunity to show increased ambition and calls for more urgent #ClimateAction. https://t.co/9t0zPDb1S3 https://t.co/U9tqhCy2Bj

🎁 With the holiday gift-giving season underway for many people around the world, @UNEP has some practical tips on how to take #ClimateAction while spreading the holiday spirit. https://t.co/ypXC0OAGrS

13% of people worldwide lack access to modern electricity, while 3 billion people lack access to clean cooking fuels.

The #GlobalGoals aim to ensure all people have access to affordable and clean energy sources by 2030. https://t.co/OwtXqcPfP9 https://t.co/v8J5fMPgmv

Mali: Escalating violence & insecurity spark unprecedented humanitarian crisis.

UN and partners are helping 3.9 million people in need of assistance & protection. https://t.co/RhQIXo12r7

Higher temperatures & more extreme, less predictable weather conditions have profound impact on world's water sources.

@UN_Water explains the crucial link between water, climate & human-well-being. https://t.co/r3ujvwTsZj #ClimateAction https://t.co/QOLsR7d1OO

40 years ago this month, smallpox, one of the deadliest diseases ever known to humans, was confirmed as having been eradicated thanks to vaccines. https://t.co/utwegCA7iY via @WHO https://t.co/oD3XWwnTt7

The gender wage gap is estimated to be about 22% globally.

@UN_Women on why economic empowerment is central to the realization of women’s rights & gender equality. https://t.co/TkSaNVCkxo #GenerationalEquality https://t.co/Z651iSCzgX

In Kuwait this week, @UN_PGA learned how civil society is empowering students to stand up against bullying & helping ensure inclusive education for students with special needs. https://t.co/oyjhuUjDlc

⚽Sports are an opportunity to be included & protected – a chance to heal, develop & grow.🏀

Ahead of next week's Global #RefugeeForum, more than 80 organizations have joined @Refugees to help young refugees discover their potential through sports. https://t.co/4mabyL0aE5

This week, @antonioguterres spoke via videolink with @astro_luca, on board the @Space_Station. 

Watch their moving conversation about the fragility of human beings & the need for #ClimateAction to protect our one and only planet. #COP25 https://t.co/M41eE3X9Yf

Every day, 33,000 girls under the age of 18 are married, often against their will.

The #16days of activism may have ended, but @UNFPA chief @Atayeshe says protecting the rights of girls & women must remain a priority each & every day. https://t.co/Zip7kouQk0

The climate emergency is worsening the intensity, frequency and unpredictability of droughts and floods in Somalia, with devastating consequences. https://t.co/oCzsaDXqlI #ClimateAction via @UNOCHA https://t.co/pFOCSV66Og

Democratic Republic of the Congo: Displaced people suffering serious human rights violations & living in fear amid continuing conflict.

@Refugees is stepping up its response & calling for greater international support. #WithRefugees https://t.co/4fVV7rWXUT

"In Yemen we are beginning to see in the hearts and minds of those who make decisions about the war, the desire to make peace."

-- @OSE_Yemen on signs of hope in the country, after four years of devastating conflict. https://t.co/6V4uZh83da https://t.co/kXciEoPIM7

Driven by aggressive consumer demand for seafood, millions of fishers across the 🌏 are held as de facto prisoners & forced to work on fishing vessels.

Protection of human rights is central to @UNDP's work. https://t.co/7fGYflECqJ #StandUp4HumanRights 

https://t.co/WhxGHK975X

We need to protect our nature and all ecosystems and restore the landscapes that have been highly degraded by human activities.

-- Costa Rica's Carlos Manuel Rodríguez shares #ClimateAction plans at #COP25. https://t.co/HkOAowiFRE https://t.co/fJWGHUpDjF

While the gap in basic living standards is narrowing for millions, a new generation of inequalities is widening around education & technology - and hindering the progress of #GlobalGoals.

More from @UNDP's #HumanDevelopment report: https://t.co/ZbKpEWgwxw #HDR2019 https://t.co/7hzmgCZW6F

Nearly 25.9 million refugees have been forced to leave their country.

On Monday's first-ever Global #RefugeeForum, world leaders, businesses and civil society will join @Refugees to strengthen global response to help refugees across the world. https://t.co/KHLmNSVJ8z https://t.co/fdgCz9rRvV
At #COP25, Ireland's @RichardbrutonTD discusses #ClimateAction plans for his country, including reaching net-zero emissions by 2050. https://t.co/HkOAowAgJc https://t.co/ImHqkCpxIe

1/3 of our food is lost or wasted every year.

Here's how you can help reduce food waste:
🛒Shop smart
📅Understand dates on food
🍏Buy 'ugly' fruit & vegetables

More tips from @FAO: https://t.co/C83tWDBYQ5 #GlobalGoals https://t.co/JPb769IbHt

"The Danish Parliament has decided that Denmark should reduce our CO2 emissions by 70% by 2030".

-- At #COP25, @DanJoergensen shares Denmark's #ClimateAction efforts. https://t.co/HkOAowiFRE https://t.co/g6dHvCVZnP

Young people will face all the consequences of climate change in the most dramatic way. So they have a moral authority to tell my generation to do the right thing.

--@antonioguterres discussed #ClimateAction live on @Facebook from #COP25. Watch: https://t.co/NgMQNi4Rq7 https://t.co/nqzVn9u1Ug

"A just transition is not only necessary, it is possible, but it will only work if governments and businesses continue to boost their overall #ClimateAction."

-- @antonioguterres at #COP25 https://t.co/0NfXJlNUpx https://t.co/fbTOBXX6B2

South Sudan: Amid intense political instability & catastrophic flooding, @WFP has amped up its operations to reach 4.6 million to avoid potential famine. https://t.co/fo2u3q694l https://t.co/UxCUPJD7gk

“The security of Ebola responders in Democratic Republic of Congo keeps me awake at night. They face deadly attacks, while trying to save the lives of others. We must set up security measures.”

-- @WHO’s @DrTedros in the @guardian

https://t.co/uosYAny5Of

"We need to make governments understand that the climate emergency is already here. We need to #ActNow!"

--@antonioguterres & youth activist Marie Christina Kolo from Madagascar discussed your #ClimateAction questions live on @Facebook from #COP25. Watch: https://t.co/NgMQNimsOH https://t.co/obUV3LtdxU

"Let us reaffirm our commitment to health for all as an investment in humanity, well-being & prosperity for everyone."

--@antonioguterres on Thursday's #HealthforAll Day. https://t.co/JjUjumqqqS https://t.co/4TdWl3mBJL
.@UNEP chief @andersen_inger calls for greater investment in nature-based solutions at the UN Climate Conference #COP25. https://t.co/HkOAowAgJc #ClimateAction https://t.co/5lihWsHCmb

1 billion more people need to benefit from Universal Health Coverage before 2030 for countries to achieve the #GlobalGoals.

Support @WHO to make #HealthForAll a reality. Here's how: https://t.co/e1eiqsFOL5 https://t.co/QmxTj66oRy

Join @antonioguterres live on @Facebook from #COP25 as he speaks with youth climate activist Marie Christina Kolo and takes your #ClimateAction questions: https://t.co/g1KgP5dlPZ #COP25 https://t.co/7j4RhUpORP

Neutrality is critical for the UN to gain & maintain the confidence & cooperation of all.

Thursday is International Neutrality Day: https://t.co/bcCndsIoRh https://t.co/H9zpmhpBJh

Health is a human right, not a luxury. Poverty should not be a cause of ill health or a barrier to accessing care when needed.

More on Thursday's #HealthForAll Day: https://t.co/e1eiqsXpCD https://t.co/AdwPxb0msh

At #COP25, 177 companies pledged to set highly ambitious emissions reduction targets to help limit the worst impacts of the climate emergency. https://t.co/midS5i7vjy via @globalcompact https://t.co/JeIHSY6pVA

The UN provides impartial mediation to prevent & de-escalate conflict. 

Thursday is International Neutrality Day: https://t.co/bcCndsqNsH https://t.co/v3UHwbxs9e

"I was moved by his description of the beauty of the planet and his assessment that the most fragile thing on earth is the human species. "

-- @antonioguterres after speaking with @astro_luca on board the @Space_Station from #COP25 in Spain. https://t.co/HkOAowiFRE https://t.co/kisCqIqNK8

A birth certificate is the first acknowledgement of a child's rights, yet the births of a quarter of the world’s children under five years old have never been recorded, says @UNICEF #ForEveryChild 
https://t.co/S6r1WD6Z86
News: Myanmar's Aung San Suu Kyi defends her country against genocide charges during @CIJ_ICJ hearing. https://t.co/ov6RBmLivt

"The world is getting hotter and more dangerous faster than we ever thought possible.

It is five minutes to midnight in the global climate emergency."

-- @antonioguterres at #COP25 https://t.co/rXeD7aPs0G #ClimateAction https://t.co/cCohWd5fvc

Anti-semitism, racism, xenophobia & intolerance are problems found in all societies. 

But every day, each and every one of us can #StandUp4HumanRights and help build a world free of discrimination & hate: https://t.co/2ftXxLSUoQ https://t.co/whbBRn9jaP

"We know what to do. We know the facts. What we need now is the courage to act."

-- Actor and activist Harrison Ford calls for #ClimateAction at UN Climate Conference #COP25 in Madrid. https://t.co/HkOAowiFRE https://t.co/LUSmZoBXuL

"We don't have to wait. We can start the change right now. We, the people." 

-- @GretaThunberg says there is hope in the climate crisis - because people are ready for change and for #ClimateAction. https://t.co/A5NCLUgsKn #COP25 https://t.co/2yxf8nS3qA

"If action is not taken, we’re all going to be in trouble."

At #COP25, @UN_PGA explains the #UNGA's role in taking urgent #ClimateAction. Watch on @Facebook: https://t.co/rn9CBbOD6V https://t.co/8ckHQpFMTG

Mountains are home to 15% of the world's population and a quarter of the 🌏's land animals & plants. Their conservation is key for achieving #GlobalGoals.

Wednesday is International Mountain Day. https://t.co/94OWBiHD9U #MountainsMatter https://t.co/xf614lAwGv

"I think everybody could do something. Just decide every morning: do I take the car? No! Or do I drive with public transport? Or do I go by bicycle?”

At #COP25, Germany's @SvenjaSchulze68 shares #ClimateAction ideas for everyone. Watch on @Facebook: https://t.co/qleF8obBU6 https://t.co/M3n0IRRtXd

Mountains are home to rare animals such as gorillas, snow leopards & beautiful plants such as orchids.

See why #MountainsMatter on Wednesday's International Mountain Day⛰️🗻: https://t.co/t3hhVrQgn5 https://t.co/GonOiIyqFR

🌳 10 billion trees
🚗 Electric vehicles
🌸 Nature-based solutions

Pakistan’s @aminattock discusses how his country is taking #ClimateAction
at the UN Climate Conference #COP25. https://t.co/HkOAowAgJc https://t.co/EhvOP7gudV

"I had the pleasure to meet @GretaThunberg for #HumanRightsDay & we had an inspiring conversation. She is living proof that we all have a role to play to create the future we want."

-- @UNHumanRights chief @mbachelet at the UN Climate Conference #COP25. https://t.co/HkOAowAgJc https://t.co/YubizB3n7j

"We are all guilty - and we are all part of the solution."

-- @AlejandroSanz encourages everyone to take #ClimateAction for our planet and our future. Find out how you can #ActNow: https://t.co/X0ShwftNUV https://t.co/ewuxrHymI8

Mountains cover 27% of the earth's land surface - but they are under threat from climate crisis.

On Tuesday's International Mountain Day, join @FAO and take action to show #MountainsMatter: https://t.co/NikfXQy5ZD https://t.co/OssF5S9uaX

.@CIJ_ICJ has completed its first day of hearings in the case of The Gambia vs Myanmar on the convention for the prevention & punishment of genocide.

Full proceedings: https://t.co/CHoE9MIgAu https://t.co/hY43G8RDGI

"We need #ClimateAction now, because we know that climate change will be one of the biggest threats for human rights."

-- @UNHumanRights chief @mbachelet on Tuesday's #HumanRightsDay from #COP25. https://t.co/HkOAowiFRE https://t.co/o7UHznJYc4

"We have to show the world that we have the will to tackle this problem head on and #ActNow."

-- Norway's Climate & Environment Minister @olaelvestuen calls for raised #ClimateAction ambition at the UN Climate Conference #COP25. https://t.co/HkOAowiFRE https://t.co/BWZheoJkr6

"All people are equal and entitled to the same human rights, and we must challenge the notion that certain groups matter more than others." 

-- @NobelPrize laureate and @UNODC Goodwill Ambassador @NadiaMuradBasee on #HumanRightsDay https://t.co/nnYwJqyUQb https://t.co/RKRsVFZH9U

"People at home can do a lot - individually they can be smart in the way that they consume: LED lamps, local food, not too much meat."

-- Get more #ClimateAction tips from @UNEP Goodwill Ambassador @bertrandpiccard from the UN Climate Conference #COP25: https://t.co/C7PxI3bvws https://t.co/dssgGvDkF1

Globally, young people are marching, organizing & speaking out.

They are marching for their right to a future of peace, justice & equal opportunities.

-- @antonioguterres on Tuesday's #HumanRightsDay: https://t.co/ccdcWy7GbT https://t.co/sEiLkv1Ect

Youth participation is essential for achieving #GlobalGoals, and young people are drivers of political, economic and social transformation.

On Tuesday's #HumanRightsDay, see how YOU can #StandUp4HumanRights: https://t.co/Fx0uQPmvW7 https://t.co/fdDcdlziOK

During emergencies, girls & women face increased risks of violence, exploitation & abuse.

@UNFPA is calling for survivor-centred care & more. https://t.co/62s24aojIG #16Days https://t.co/x5Eo9B7M0e

The Universal Declaration of Human Rights has helped improve the lives of millions and lay the foundations for a more just world.

More on Tuesday's #HumanRightsDay: https://t.co/2YXykxY7Go https://t.co/hcalHQt5MP

As global humanitarian needs reach unprecedented levels, countries pledge support for @UNCERF- which provides urgent, life-saving assistance to those affected by crises around the world. #InvestInHumanity https://t.co/yzoa0Nem7I

.@GretaThunberg joined indigenous youth & other young activists to demand urgent #ClimateAction at the UN Climate Conference #COP25 in Madrid on Monday.

We all have a role to play in saving our planet & our future. Here's how you can #ActNow: https://t.co/X0Shwfcd3n https://t.co/CsJ7rq91t4

20% of human development progress was lost due to inequalities last year.

Inequalities affect everything from global health to nutrition to education, resulting in weakened economies & eroding people's trust in governments & each other. https://t.co/6iluUQ6Hzf via @UNDP #HDR2019 https://t.co/cQnlAh2ZGu
Indigenous people from around the 🌍 demand urgent #ClimateAction and greater ambition at the UN Climate Conference #COP25 in Spain. https://t.co/HkOAowiFRE https://t.co/1wi3CgdEMy

"By promoting a culture of peace and non-violence that includes respect for diversity and non-discrimination, we can build societies that are resilient to the risk of genocide."

-- @antonioguterres on Monday's #PreventGenocide Day. https://t.co/5s3N9xfmk2 https://t.co/tq0UieMqpQ

$2.6 trillion is lost annually to corruption each year, hindering economic growth and spreading inequality.

On Monday's International Anti-Corruption Day and every day, stand #UnitedAgainstCorrption. https://t.co/0mzwCAJqBf https://t.co/hAibfUDhC4

Got a question about the climate emergency for @antonioguterres?

Submit it here and he may answer it live on @Facebook from #COP25 in Madrid on Thursday at 9.00 am CET ➡️ https://t.co/g1KgP5dlPZ https://t.co/XNwXrfFP1U
Continues this week @UNGeneva: Committee on the Elimination of Racial Discrimination, 100th session (through 13 Dec): https://t.co/6knOwiWCeV #StandUp4HumanRights https://t.co/fKqj6J6tEi
On Monday's #PreventGenocide day, find out about the Genocide Convention & its role in combating and preventing the crime of genocide: https://t.co/LoeJKNNE3m https://t.co/N5eAc5DtLZ

Happening this week: UN Climate Conference #COP25, #HumanRightsDay Global #RefugeeForum & much more.

Full list is here: https://t.co/aOqF6cv967 https://t.co/h1lWCFPMW3
UN Climate Conference #COP25 continues this week in Madrid, Spain. Details from @UNFCCC: https://t.co/HkOAowiFRE #ClimateAction https://t.co/ZlKIhkRMsn

Bribery, embezzlement, money laundering ... corruption has many forms.

On Monday's International Anti-Corruption Day, stand #UnitedAgainstCorruption: https://t.co/0mzwCArPcF https://t.co/vPQssOmkiD

Preventing genocide requires early action to protect those at risk.

More on the UN's work to #PreventGenocide on Monday's International Day: https://t.co/JdtaklVDh7 https://t.co/37MpFGTzlF

From Chile to Morocco to Mali, see how the @WorldBank is supporting countries as they work to cut emissions & adapt to the risks caused by the climate crisis. https://t.co/YEn0pzsVP5 #COP25 https://t.co/5iEMrzRY8p

Abuse doesn't always leave physical scars.

During the #16Days of activism, we can all do something to end violence against women and girls. https://t.co/rWvDai8GW9 https://t.co/iROsTWTyFu

“Genocide is a process. The Holocaust did not start with the gas chambers. It started with hate speech.”

-- @UN_GP_RtoP's Adama Dieng on the dangers of hate speech and intolerance on Monday's #PreventGenocide Day. https://t.co/lwgBpXHHxN https://t.co/K5Z3MFP5vd

Trust between law enforcement & communities is key to effective policing & crime prevention.

@UNPOL is supporting South Sudanese police officers as they strengthen their working relations with the public. https://t.co/sUGR1poUaC #ServingForPeace https://t.co/cJVdjvnUYT

To achieve the #GlobalGoals we need strong, transparent & inclusive institutions.

Monday is International Anti-Corruption Day: https://t.co/0mzwCArPcF #UnitedAgainstCorruption https://t.co/JzCYy3rDy5

.@UNICEF launches its largest-ever emergency funding appeal as conflicts, climate-related extreme weather events, natural disasters & health emergencies put record number of children at risk. https://t.co/4RRnrD9kSB https://t.co/pqeS6VvfZt

Innovative plastic recycling systems are boosting incomes, while also helping to improve infrastructure depended upon by millions in India.

More on this unique @UNDP project. #ClimateAction https://t.co/kSuFTGBX5q

Coal plants account for more than 70% of energy-sector emissions. 

Amid urgent calls for #ClimateAction, see how the UN is supporting the move toward clean, cheap & accessible energy. https://t.co/YRUc8NBnB7

Students in Uganda are using creative #ClimateAction solutions to turn waste into wealth, all while learning about the importance of the #GlobalGoals. https://t.co/27DEF2E7On via @africarenewal https://t.co/sujrvl5mDR

"We need a rapid & deep change in the way we do business, how we generate power, how we build cities, how we move & how we feed the world.

If we don’t urgently change our way of life, we jeopardize life itself."

-- @antonioguterres at #COP25. https://t.co/ankmXmhFys https://t.co/BPZoCCYqWf
From speeches to historical info about membership, learn more about your country's work at the UN with @UNLibrary's online resource centre. https://t.co/VNLj2z9Um1 https://t.co/IKAw38yi9T

“We had nothing left. There are days I don’t know what my children will eat."

@WFP is in Haiti working to reach the most vulnerable, as political & economic instability leaves 3.7 million people hungry. #ZeroHunger https://t.co/fgd7tOUmu6
On Saturday's International Civil Aviation Day, learn about @ICAO's efforts to help the world stay connected for 75 years. https://t.co/UUdKbPxdJg #FlyDay https://t.co/msTHx5YehL

Today's youth are leaders when it comes to taking #ClimateAction.

Meet some of the young people inspiring change to protect our planet & all its people. https://t.co/54zJUtO3d7 via @UNDP #COP25 https://t.co/uvDngNA19r

Global aviation employs more than 10 million women & men and generates $2.7 trillion in revenue.

Saturday is International Civil Aviation Day. https://t.co/bVYDfvk5Gh #FlyDay https://t.co/BWgthiZyiv

Aviation is an engine of global connectivity and helps support economic & social development around the world. 

Saturday is International Civil Aviation Day: https://t.co/Z7InkQXBuA #FlyDay https://t.co/9aWtLTP3mg

"We want to have a future."

At #COP25, Vaia from Tuvalu & Mii from the Cook Islands explain why the climate emergency an existential threat & how young people can take #ClimateAction.

Watch them on @facebook with @UNYouthEnvoy: https://t.co/LWLhWD42Uh https://t.co/cNY2H4ngkf

"Our peacekeepers represent the last, best hope for millions of people around the world."

-- @antonioguterres' latest @UNPeacekeeping update: https://t.co/1A8BR52m9H #ServingForPeace https://t.co/BkzTlnTPgt
